containers:

	open container from an image archive:
		[xonsh] docker container list
		[xonsh] docker import EC_Book_4.tar
		
		xor:
			[xonsh] docker run -it {image ID} /bin/bash
			[xonsh] docker run -v /path_inside_host:/path_inside_container -it {image ID} /bin/bash

	save container as image archive:
		[xonsh] docker export --output="EC_Book_4.tar" {container ID}


	save changes to a container:
		[xonsh] 


	delete:
		[xonsh] docker container rm {CONTAINER ID}
	
	delete every non-running container:
		[xonsh] docker container prune -f
	
	
	list every:
		[xonsh] docker container list --all
	
	list:
		[xonsh] docker container list
